title: Total assets of HSBC 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Total assets in billion U.S.dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, of value 2715.15 was reached at Year 2019
The lowest Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, of value 2354.3 was reported at Year 2007
